definition: to promulgate/to send out/to issue/to grant or confer
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.chinese: 頒發結業證書，後續課程服務。

sentences.english: At the same time, Li Shizhen Medicine Innovation Award is presented at first.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，李時珍醫藥創新獎也在會上首次頒發。

sentences.english: The president gave away prizes at the school sports.
sentences.chinese: 校長在學校運動會上頒發獎品。

sentences.english: The government gave him his first patent on an electric device he called an Electrographic Vote Recorder.
sentences.chinese: 政府爲他的電記錄計票器頒發了第一個專利。

sentences.english: We have invited a famous former student to give away the prizes.
sentences.chinese: 我們邀請了一位知名校友來頒發獎品。

sentences.english: Article 3 The Certificates are exclusively issued by the National Development and Reform Commission (NDRC).
sentences.chinese: 第三條執法證由國家發展和改革委員會統一頒發。

sentences.english: Prince Michael of Kent presented the prizes.
sentences.chinese: 肯特親王邁克爾頒發了獎品。

sentences.english: The Nobel Prize for Physics this year was given to two scientists from America.
sentences.chinese: 今年的諾貝爾物理獎頒發給了美國的兩名科學家。

sentences.english: The mayor gave away the prizes at the school sports.
sentences.chinese: 市長在校運會上頒發了獎品。

sentences.english: The company awarded the employees prizes for full attendance in one month.
sentences.chinese: 這個公司頒發全勤獎給一個月都沒請假的員工。

sentences.english: Over the intervening 109 years, more than 500 prizes have been awarded.
sentences.chinese: 在此的109年間，一共頒發了500多個諾貝爾獎。

sentences.english: Robinson was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom by Obama in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 羅賓遜2009年接受了奧巴馬頒發的總統自由勳章。

sentences.english: President Gerald Ford presented her with the Medal of Freedom in nineteen seventy-seven.
sentences.chinese: 在1977年傑拉爾德福特總統頒發給她自由勳章。

sentences.english: The official document issued by the pope was sealed with a bulla.
sentences.chinese: 由教皇頒發的官方文件是用印璽封住的。

sentences.english: Your state of motion, giving you the mileage awarded medals.
sentences.chinese: 你的運動狀態，讓您的里程頒發了獎牌。

sentences.english: Completes the studies, may obtain the certificate of proficiency which the Shandong Province work hall issues.
sentences.chinese: 完成學業，可獲山東省勞動廳頒發的結業證書。

definition: to promulgate/to send out/to issue/to grant or confer
special glory/distinction/rare honor/one's laurels/it's a privilege (to meet you)
to organize/to host (a conference or sports event)
to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
